<|ref|>image<|/ref|><|det|>[[735, 212, 902, 255]]<|/det|> <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 280, 170, 291]]<|/det|> **PHYSICS** <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[832, 280, 904, 291]]<|/det|> **0625/21** <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 301, 904, 313]]<|/det|> Paper 2 Core **May/June 2012** <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[760, 323, 904, 334]]<|/det|> **1 hour 15 minutes** <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 341, 415, 353]]<|/det|> Candidates answer on the Question Paper. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 361, 368, 372]]<|/det|> No Additional Materials are required. <|ref|>title<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 394, 386, 405]]<|/det|> # READ THESE INSTRUCTIONS FIRST <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 420, 718, 432]]<|/det|> Write your Centre number, candidate number and name on all the work you hand in. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 435, 325, 446]]<|/det|> Write in dark blue or black pen. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 449, 462, 461]]<|/det|> You may use a pencil for any diagrams or graphs. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 463, 599, 475]]<|/det|> Do not use staples, paper clips, highlighters, glue or correction fluid. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 477, 384, 488]]<|/det|> DO **NOT** WRITE IN ANY BARCODES. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 504, 255, 514]]<|/det|> Answer **all** questions. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 517, 633, 542]]<|/det|> You may lose marks if you do not show your working or if you do not use appropriate units. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 545, 636, 557]]<|/det|> Take the weight of 1kg to be 10N (i.e. acceleration of free fall \(=10m/s^{2}\) ). <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 571, 603, 583]]<|/det|> At the end of the examination, fasten all your work securely together. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 585, 652, 611]]<|/det|> The number of marks is given in brackets [ ] at the end of each question or part question. <|ref|>table<|/ref|><|det|>[[710, 485, 904, 848]]<|/det|>
